title: save-analysis: ICE when name resolution fails

labels.name: E-easy
labels.description: Call for participation: Experience needed to fix: Easy / not much (good first issue)

labels.name: E-mentor
labels.description: Call for participation: This issue has a mentor. Use RustcContributor::new on Zulip for discussion.

body:
STR: run with `-Zsave-analysis` on a program with a name resolution error. Result:

```
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', src/libcore/option.rs:323
stack backtrace:
   1:        0x10608efe8 - std::sys::backtrace::tracing::imp::write::he09d58d1497100a9
```

cc https://github.com/jonathandturner/rustls/issues/41 (bug manifests in the RLS)
